Am using Eclipse M4 on WinXP, JDK 1.4.x. 

Trying to run 'all' JUnit tests in a package, but
run into an error when a test is trying to 'create a
file' on the local filesystem. 

Get the following stacktrace: 
java.io.IOException: The system cannot find the path specified
	at java.io.WinNTFileSystem.createFileExclusively(Native Method)

Am thinking it's not setting the correct 'working directory'
variable or some param not passed to the JVM correctly.
I have set the current working directory to the project
itself, but that does not help.

Have seen the same problem w/ Eclipse M3.
